title: Colorado Man Charged in Fatal Crash
body: A Colorado man, Christopher Neff, faces charges of vehicular homicide, aggravated manslaughter, and weapons-related charges after a crash on the New Jersey Turnpike killed four bochurim on October 19.

title: Moetzes Gedolei HaTorah Unite
body: Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch and Rav Meir Tzvi Bergman join Degel HaTorah's Moetzes Gedolei HaTorah and American counterparts for a historic gathering in Bnei Brak.
